translation.en: Study, study, study. Quizzing is good for you.
translation.it: - Studio, studio, studio. - I quiz fanno per voi.

translation.en: That is correct. Who will indeed?

translation.en: -Have we seen you in Bangalore quizzes? -We've seen you.
translation.it: - Vi abbiamo viste al quiz di Bangalore? - Abbiamo visto voi.

translation.en: -We were at the South Zone championship. -Which we won.
translation.it: - Eravamo al torneo del Sud. - Vinto da noi.

translation.en: Oh, really, how could you tell?

translation.en: I'm Randeep... Randy.
translation.it: Sono Randeep...Randy.

translation.en: No predictable Irish jokes, please.

translation.en: -Rani. -Yasmin.
translation.it: - Rani. - Yasmin.

translation.en: He's Naman, our team captain.

translation.en: I have seen Trappist monks speak more than your team captain.

translation.en: Forget it. He's in love. With me.

translation.en: It's been known to work.

translation.en: I'm going to try and chat with Paddy.

translation.en: -How about Rita? -Who?

translation.en: A beaker full of the warm south.
